items.sentence: Tom sat next to Mary with his arm around her.
I can't believe that you're doing this to me.
There are very few brick houses in this town.
Did you really think that I wouldn't do that?
Nuclear weapons are a threat to all humanity.
We turned left at the corner and drove north.
Our school has adopted a new teaching method.
There's nothing like ice cream in the summer.
The rightmost lane is now under construction.
Not knowing what to say, Tom remained silent.
